word: Addressing you, the Lord's messenger said, "Cease to heed the suggestions of the enemy. Be led by the Lord. Walk in the way of His providence. Do not betray the work into the enemy's hands by yielding to his evil suggestions. Look to Jesus. . . . In no case turn from your brethren, who have been your true friends.--Letter 61, April 17, 1902, to a couple who had pioneered work in the Southern States.
